entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:28 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Rain, -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 2:00 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Rain
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -1.6°C
Wind: ENE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Thursday: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Freezing rain or ice pellets mixed with snow beginning early this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with snow changing to rain near midnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming southwest 20 after midnight. Temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to zero in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
